## ProgramBuilder.lessThan() method

return true if x is less than y, otherwise false

**Signature:**

```typescript
lessThan(x: number | PBShaderExp, y: number | PBShaderExp): PBShaderExp;
```

|  --- | --- | --- |
|  x | number \| [PBShaderExp](doc/markdown/./device.pbshaderexp.md) |  |
|  y | number \| [PBShaderExp](doc/markdown/./device.pbshaderexp.md) |  |

[PBShaderExp](doc/markdown/./device.pbshaderexp.md)
